== New Hampshire Local Community Team ==
{{https://wiki.ubuntu.com/NewHampshireTeam/pictures?action=AttachFile&do=get&target=Ubuntu-License-Plate-Retouched.png}}

=== Joining ===
Living in New Hampshire and have an interest in Ubuntu?  Hit up our <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-us-nh|Launchpad page]]</nowiki> to sign up and subscribe to our <nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/mailman/listinfo/ubuntu-us-nh|mailing list]]</nowiki>.  You're also invited and encouraged to join us at monthly LoCo meetings and other social functions.

 
=== What We Do ===
* Educate the public about Ubuntu
* Supply Ubuntu (CDs & CD images)
* Support Ubuntu Locally
* Conduct outreach programs
* Ubuntu Activism
* Partner with local businesses and educational institutions to further Ubuntu

=== Communications Channels ===
* '''Launchpad''': <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-us-nh|Launchpad]]</nowiki>
* '''Mailing List''': <nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/mailman/listinfo/ubuntu-us-nh|ubuntu-us-nh@lists.ubuntu.com]]</nowiki> 
* '''IRC Channel''': irc://irc.freenode.net #ubuntu-us-nh
